channel.title: Npc Attacking
channel.description: Alright this might be nooby question but I have been searching throught my npc handler and client and all that shit looking for anything that might tell the npcs to attack the person that attacked them. So far no luck. Does anyone know how to fix it or have a code to fix it. If so please help me.
